#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int roomx,roomy,tilex,tiley,cases,A,a;
	cin>>cases;
    while(cases--)
    {
        cin>>roomx>>roomy>>tilex>>tiley;
        A=roomx*roomy;a=tilex*tiley;
        if(A%a==0)
        cout<<"yes\n";
        else
        cout<<"no\n";
    }
    return 0;

}
